item.title: ethereum & marshy, a new project!
item.description: So a while back I was asked by my dad, “What does BitCoin have to do with these computer parts shortages?" Well I knew the basics of the blockchain idea, but I didn't know the specifics. So after a bit of googling I found out and that was that. Now a few days later I saw a video in my YouTube recommended feed: “Programming the blockchain with Ethereum!” or something like that.
